ESP: Chapter 161 – Catch it or Be Caught (4)

Previous Chapter Next Chapter

Chapter 161 – Catch it or Be Caught (4)

 

10.

A report came in.

“What did you just say?”

– There is an ongoing battle at the Heard Fortress.  It seems someone disturbed Anugas.

When he received the report, Sinclair didn’t ask for the identity of the person or group fighting Anugas.

    lol, the eye was the weakness all along, just like every other one-eyed monster

    Log in to Reply ↓
    1. This Is Sporta
      August 16, 2017 at 6:29 pm

      Well it makes the most sense, for almost any being who has eyes, because if you think about it for a moment, the eyes are usually the softest part of a body, and the closest organ to the brain, and the bigger the body, the closer the eyes are the brain. Because the brain needs to react faster to what it sees with a bigger body with slower speeds. Especially for things like cyclopses, it’s eye is bigger and most likely very close to the brain, so it’s kind of a cliché, but at least it’s a cliché that makes sense when thought about with a little bit of common sense and knowledge on biology.

      Log in to Reply ↓
